alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Hale; Shelby; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 12:55PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Tuscaloosa, southwestern Shelby, northeastern Hale and central Bibb Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 1255 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tannehill Ironworks State Park to near Moundville. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Montevallo, Brent, Centreville, Moundville, Coaling, Vance, Woodstock, West Blocton, Wilton, Tannehill Ironworks State Park, American Village, Low Gap, Mertz, University Of Montevallo, Mercedes Benz Of Alabama, Eoline, North Bibb, Moundville Airport, Hagler and Hull. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
